description: The vibe of a book lover or intellectual. Also "Shuxiangwei", "Shusheng zhi qi".

examples.chinese: 戴黑框眼镜就变成了有书卷气
examples.translation: Wearing black-rimmed glasses gives a scholarly vibe

examples.chinese: 真的很喜欢这种有书卷气的美女
examples.translation: Really like this kind of beauty with a scholarly vibe

examples.chinese: 学校宿舍没有书卷气,只有一股臭jio丫子味
examples.translation: School dorm has no scholarly vibe, just a smell of stinky feet
